name: Obverse (ridhachowdhury)
description:
Obverse was originally created for the game jam 1 bit weekend. I picked the project back up after a year of side projects a better developer.

This is just a demo build, final release will have more levels and a mobile build (hopefully).

Thank you for playing, or at least visiting.

Tutorial:

A and D to move

Space to jump

Shift to reflect

You cannot reflect if there isn't a clearance on the other side

If you have feedback please leave it in the comments and follow me.

If you'd like to follow the project this is my YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeP0iK443zC2GzgiTnCizIg
